snippet: Support for Scottish independence amounts to 46 percent of the electorate with 54 percent wanting to stay in the United Kingdom, according to a poll by YouGov carried out on the day of the referendum....

headline.print_headline: Support for Scottish Independence at 46 Percent: YouGov Poll
headline.main: Support for Scottish Independence at 46 Percent: YouGov Poll

lead_paragraph: Support for Scottish independence amounts to 46 percent of the electorate with 54 percent wanting to stay in the United Kingdom, according to a poll by YouGov carried out on the day of the referendum.
